name: php-unparser
description: Unparse the AST produced by glayzzle/php-parser back to code.

scripts.prebuild: node node_modules/jslint/bin/jslint.js --indent 2 --color package.json index.js node_translators/*.js node_translators/**/*.js && node test/index.js

author: Christopher Luna <dev@christopher-luna.com>
